entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
